title: 2018 North Carolina Senate election
added: Incumbent Republican [[Joyce Krawiec]] has represented the 31st district since 2014.

title: 2018 North Carolina Senate election
added:
Incumbent Republican [[Dan Barrett (politician)|Dan Barrett]] has represented the 34th district since 2017.
Barrett didn't seek re-election.

title: 2018 North Carolina Senate election
added:
Incumbent Republican [[Bill Cook (politician)|Bill Cook]] has represented the 1st district since 2013.
Cook didn't seek re-election. Representative [[Bob Steinburg]] won the open seat.

title: 2018 North Carolina Senate election
added:
Incumbent Republican [[Tamara Barringer]] has represented the 17th district since 2013. Following redistricting, this seat was made more competitive.
Barringer lost re-election to Democrat [[Sam Searcy]]

title: 2018 North Carolina Senate election
added:
Incumbent Republican [[Tamara Barringer]] has represented the 17th district since 2013. Following redistricting, this seat was made more competitive.
Barringer lost re-election to Democrat [[Sam Searcy]].
